```{r setup}
library(brentlabRnaSeqTools)
```

```{r}
combined_df = getMetadata(api_url)
```

```{r}
induction_set = createNinetyMinuteInductionSet(combined_df, grant_df)
```

```{r}
non_90minInduct_non_wt_samples = combined_df %>% filter(genotype1 != 'CNAG_00000', (!genotype1 %in% induction_set$GENOTYPE1 | !is.na(genotype2)), perturbation1 != 'geneSwap')
```

```{r}
View(non_90minInduct_non_wt_samples %>% group_by(genotype1, genotype2) %>% tally())
```
